summary: A Dragon Priest I created to help alongside battles the user may face.
descriptionHtml:
KhaljÂ is an invulnerable Dragon Priest. If he seems overpowered let me know and I will balance him accordingly. The preset A.I. for dragon priests in Skyrim allows him to use destruction magic of a certain class based on the opponents weakness. For a frost dragon(testing phase results) he uses electric magic. And he uses frost magic for fire dragons and you can probably figure out the rest.

[b]THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW
[/b]- he attacks NPCs if he is not following you, which is why he is located in the bedroom section of Breezhome
- use the download manually button
- this is the first mod I have posted, not the first I have created
author: BonJava -Nexus Name is RazorFadeII-
